pbl_formulas:
Req_01 = p_register <=> t_log
Req_02 = p_unregister <=> t_log
Req_03 = (~p_speak | ~p_listen)
Req_04 = ((Req04tp_speak => (Req04tp_is_registered_to_t & p1_is_registered_to_t & p1_is_different_with_Req04tp & ~p1_speak or Req04tp_listen & t_broadcast)))
Main_Exp: Req_01 & Req_02 & Req_03 & Req_04
